revised_title: Evolution of the Vertebral Column in Fishes: Insights from Sklerotome Development
tldr: This article examines the evolution of the vertebral column in fishes, focusing on the development of sklerotomes. The author proposes a new understanding of how the vertebral column forms and evolves, challenging previous theories on the subject. The study provides insights into the development of the vertebral column in other chordates, including humans.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Comparative Anatomy
